Detailed Description

Implements HMAC - the FIPS standard keyed hash function.

Member Function Documentation

bool CHmac::SHA1Key ( const char *  pKey,
UINT  uKeyLength 
)

Sets the HMAC key.

Can be called multiple times.

Parameters:
[in] pKey The key to set.
uKeyLength The length of pKey.
Returns:
false, if the total key input size is too large; true otherwise.

void CHmac::Data ( const char *  pData,
UINT  uSize 
)

Sets the HMAC data.

Can be called multiple times. This method terminates the key input phase.

Parameters:
[in] pData The HMAC data.
uSize The size of pData.

Computes and outputs the MAC value.
